sentence: Meanwhile, GOP figures like Thom Tillis, a senator from Cawthorn's home state, are backing one of his primary challengers Chuck Edwards.
author: Cheryl Teh
title: Fox News host says Madison Cawthorn needs to name those involved in orgies and drugs, or admit to making up stories about DC's elite

sentence: ? NC-11: While state Sen. Chuck Edwards' new spot avoids directly mentioning freshman incumbent Madison Cawthorn, the person he's trying to unseat in next month's GOP primary, there's no question whom Edwards is comparing himself to when he says, "If you want a celebrity, go watch the Kardashians.
title: Morning Digest: Maryland's Republican governor and Democratic legislature reach redistricting deal
